import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
useEffect(() => {
  fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/items') // URL of the backend API
  .then(response => {
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to fetch data');
    }
    return response.json();
  }).then(items => {
    setItems(items); // Update state with fetched data
    setLoading(false); // Loading complete
  }).catch(error => {
    setError(error.message); // Handle errors
    setLoading(false);
  });
}, []);
export default items;

sourcesContent:

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';


  


  useEffect(() => {
    fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/items') // URL of the backend API
      .then((response) => {
        if (!response.ok) {
          throw new Error('Failed to fetch data');
        }
        return response.json();
      })
      .then((items) => {
        setItems(items); // Update state with fetched data
        setLoading(false); // Loading complete
      })
      .catch((error) => {
        setError(error.message); // Handle errors
        setLoading(false);
      });
  }, []);

  




export default items;
